String.string:
+1-6: Alkahest / Godly Alkahest / Extensive Alkahest
+7-9: Refined Alkahest / Refined Godly Alkahest / Extensive Alkahest
+10-12 : Masterwork Alkahest, Premium Alkahest, Extensive Alkahest
String.title: Recommended Alkahest

String.string:
- When using Auto-Enchant feature, the consumed items and alkahests do not change automatically when reaching new enchantment stages.

Auto-Enchant cancels when your item is enchanted to its maximum or when you run out of materials.

- Materials already enchanted or higher tier than the target item are excluded from the Auto-Enchant feature.
String.title: <font color = '#FF0000'>Caution</font>: when Using Auto-Enchant

String.string:
- On failure, enchantment stage falls down to +12 in awakening.

- Enchantment stones used for awakening are not accumulated.
String.title: <font color = '#FF0000'>Caution</font>: when awakening equipment
